bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Procedures for Obtaining Synchronous Machine Parameters by Standstill Frequency Response Testing
IEEE Standard Procedures for Obtaining Synchronous Machine Parameters by Standstill Frequency Response Testing

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The application of standstill frequency response testing methods for obtaining direct- and quadrature-axis stability parameters is described. Measurable parameters at standstill are discussed, and the test method is described. This standard is a supplement to ANSI/IEEE Std 115-1983, IEEE Guide: Test Procedures for Synchronous Machines.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
